Earthquake Game - Play Earthquake Flash Games Online Action Games Adventure Games Board Games Coins Games Customize Games Dress-Up Games Driving Games Education Games Featured Games Fighting Games Other Games Premium Puzzles Games Rhythm Games Shooting Games Sports Games Strategy Games Login to submit your scores Username: Password: Remember me Register for free! Play! Earthquake Earthquake Game Drive the car to the earthquake victims and take them somewhere they need. Instructions Take a Injured to the hopistal, take a homeless to the tents And bring food from the UN base to those who are hungry. But your truck canâ€™t load more than two items, so try to manage who to help now and who a bit later! Game Control Scheme Tags hackathon2011 Game Categories Driving Games , Education Games , Strategy Games More Games ... More Fun Kids Who Played This Game Also Played Earthquake Earthquake is a puzzle survival game, in which you're trying to save a life of an old lady. Place a different blocks in her way to help her escape the quake. Run for Life A terrible earthquake hit Japan. Do you want to survive in the earthquake? Yes, let's accompany the man in this game escape the earthquake zone! Now we only can rely on our own fingers! Disruptive Ride The Earthquake is chasing you... Drive your SUV as fast as possible and get out of the city and highway. white car rally manager Jigsaw Puzzle - white car rally manager What disaster are you A disastrous and stylize quiz game for everybody who has always wanted to know what natural disaster is in her or him. The quiz determines your daily disaster personality. Play the quiz and find out what your daily disaster is! Start the game. Rebuild Chile Help the children from chile affected by the earthquake/tsunami by playing this game. All the funds will go to Unicef Chile. car game dont drink First click on screen and drive with your arrows keys.In this game drive the car, don't drink wine's glasses, and stay in the street's line. When you are drunk your car goes to right.and when you drive on the grass your car goes slowly and to the right.If you do 3 errors you lose.Enjoy the game and submit your score. The Restaurant Manager After 4 years of hard studying, you become the manager of this Restaurant, you are the one to manage this spacial dinner place! Good Luck. Crazy Traffic The Traffic is crazy out there. Your objective is to drive your car in the traffic jam and clear your way. Test your skills in 7 countries. Select your favorite car to drive. Avoid hitting the other vehicles. You have only three chance to avoid crash. Drive safe ! Drive You Mad "Drive You Mad" is a revolutionary car game! "Drive You Mad" has two opposite directions simultaneously! As the levels increased the roads gets more populated! As the difficulty increased the roads switched every 10 seconds! "Drive You Mad" has more than 30 levels! "Drive You Mad" is enjoyable, challenging, addictive game! Ferrari Course Wow! The fastest car in the world is now your Ferrari! What can be greater than this? I mean everybody would like to drive around a cook red Ferrari but you are the only who actually can do it. Enjoy the time and drive around with no fear at all. Explore the maximum speed and the comfort of the car. Adrenaline Speed Drive Drive car as fast as you can before the time up,but watch your speed! Cinema drive in parking Use your ability to drive to put through really bad left vehicles without damaging your car. Also you must prevent lumps and breaks in the street and try to squash your car into small parking lots!Have fun! Car Escape 2 Drive your car passing over all obstacles. Long Drive After Rain Rain has gone. Just pick up your favorite car and take it to your preferred race-course. Just knows that how accurately and how long you can drive. It’s a game with the power of fun, simplicity and challenge. Car Maze Drive your car to the goal by passing through a maze. Car Driver Drive your car carefull trough this road of dead! Tipsy Drive Tipsy Drive Car Escape Drive your car to escape from the enemy territory by clicking/hitting the objects. 3D Winter Car Drive a 3d weird winter truck and use your best skills to move to the target spot. Play up to 26 levels of pure car driving fun. AI Car Parking Try new online parking game in neon style. Your goal is to park your car in the right place. Be careful, do not hit the other cars, avoid the moving cars and do not drive into the static object. Learn to park car using key arrows. Pogoleg Pirates Managerial game in which you take role of pogoleg pirate races manager. Train your pirate in bar, buy items in black market, bet to earn extra cash in this exciting manager game. A Small Car 3D Physics driving game! Get your small car to the goal in each level without falling down on the way. Drive as fast as you can manage and get all the stars to unlock the bonus level. Car Parking 2050 Travel in future and park your super futuristic car in different places without crashing! To pass the level and unlock the next one, you must park perfectly before you run out of time! So, drive the car correctly, show your parking skills and be aware, time is precious! Bullet Car Drive your transforming car through an apocalyptic wasteland with the power of a single key. Switch between bullet mode and car mode - use bullet mode to smash through gates and jump large gaps, making sure you land in car mode and roll down hills to increase your speed. Watch our for robotic sentinels who are out to destroy you. If you like Tiny Wings or Dillo Hills then there is a good chance you will like this new take on the idea. Car Ferry In this tricky physics game you need to get the car onto the ferry. There’s just one problem: there’s no bridge! Use the available materials to create a makeshift bridge that will stay afloat long enough for the car to board. Click to drop objects. As soon as you’ve created a bridge, click the car to make it drive across. Collect as many stars as you can for extra points! Micro Drive Drive a micro car in a road full of vehicles and avoid getting crashed into them, on the way, collect many fuel tanks and energy cells to gather points. Collect orbs and fuel tanks in a specific order to score combos. Race for the highest score The artwork at the title is a picture of a statue by Erwin Wurm, located in one of his famous galleries. Buggy Car Get ready for a new race!!! This time you are driving, so pay attention not to crush or loose your buggy control. Find your way to the victory, go fast and use all the speed you can to finish the race, but drive safely! Enjoy your car, improve it and go race again! Good luck! Taxi Express Drive the passengers to their destinations as quickly as possible without damaging your car. Drive carfully and stop for red traffic lights. Buy upgrades for your taxi and earn more money! Oliver&the Basilisks The sorcerer's apprentice, Oliver, was experimenting with his master's spell book while he was away. Oliver wanted to try to summon a basilisk, but got a few words wrong and ended up summoning EVERY basilisk. In the entire world. Now Oliver has to try to clear out the tower as best he can before his master gets back! The mechanics of this game are based on the early computer game "Robots," but significantly expanded and enhanced by the addition of 3, 6 or 12 (depending on game mode) spells to choose from. What will you do when the basilisks have you cornered? Teleport to safety? Take them on with Distintegrate? Gamble with an Earthquake spell? The more efficiently you clear each level, the better the rewards you'll get for the next level... and you'll need them, because each level has more and more basilisks to be disposed of! Magic Spirits and Golems complicate matters even further. This is a retro, arcade-style game; there is no ending, or "win" condition. The objective is to progress as far as you can, and strive for higher and higher scores. There is both a local (personal) high score table, and the option to submit your score ... Highway Escape Highway escape is a great car racing game! You are on the run trying to escape, drive as far as you can on the highway! Do not hit other cars and trucks. Your fuel is limited, so collect all the cans on your way. How far can you drive? Las Vegas Parking Wonderful parking online game by Free-Hidden-Object.com. Try to park the expensive car so that the car is undamaged. As the rich people trust you with their expensive toy and will be very upset if there are scratches on their car. Drive around the obstacles and other prestigious cars. Christmas Tractor When the road is icy, and the snow is everywhere, and with your car is incredible hard and risky to drive, what do you do? Well of course, you get on the Tractor, and you go where you have to go. In this Christmas racing game, you will have to drive the tractor to the final level of the game, and see how much points you can get. Ben 10 Delivery Drive with Ben 10 in a supercar and try to transport all items that are loaded on your car Box Versus Bear Dodge the bears. Protect the Burgers. A local fast food restaurant is constantly burglarized by bears for the burgers. The manager hangs the patty meat high from a tree to protect it. In response, the bears build a catapult with their engineering skills. Play as the box (more likely the manager controlling the rope) and dodge flung bears. Protect the burgers for as long as possible. Parking Space 3 The third part of the popular car game Parking Space. Drive your car and park it into marked parking area without hitting anything and before the time runs out. Drive Thru 101 Find your way through the Drive Thru maze, pick up your burger and head for the exit. Speed Challengers 2 Drive your car over the bridges, upgrade your car and complete all challenges and achievements! Play more cool games on www.coffingames.com and www.onlineartgames.com Taxi driver challenge 2 Try to get in taxi driver shoes. Your task is to look for passengers and transport them to place where they ask You to drive. Closely monitor the condition of the car and fuel gauge, because gasoline can only be bought and the car can be repaired only with faster you will take the passengers to their destination and the faster you'll pass the level the more money you can earn. For the money earned, you can buy a more powerful and faster car. R4CE 2078 You are car thief in year 2078, you have to run from mars city with stolen car to your hideout. Upgrade your hacking device, drive like crazy and become the best speed racers thief in solar system! Click here to cancel reply.
